# Hassle-free HMO plans for SMEs in the Philippines
Empower your team with hassle-free health insurance through our all-in-one digital platform, tailor-made for small-medium enterprises.
[Get a Quote](https://www.ourhivehealth.com/</get-a-quote>)
![Icon of doctor and patient waving](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/6555b951d2dde0f18158f504_hero-illustration.svg)
## Experience the Hive Difference
![Icon medicine](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/6576df1246fa9d4b506ee43c_green-healthcare-icon.png)
### Comprehensive & Modern Benefits
Complete HMO coverage with unique benefits such as teleconsults, mental health, maternity, and medicine.
![Icon healing hands](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/6576e099925cfac8e447aa7f_yellow-hands-icon.png)
### **Hassle-Free Care Availment**
Responsive omni-channel customer care hotlines, members can request Letters of Authorization (LOAs), book teleconsults & APE directly from Hive portal.
![Icon medical professional](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/6576e194b1be92fb6ffbba37_red-user-icon.png)
### **Simplified and Efficient HR Processes**
Add and terminate members with 1 day, see employees’ APE results, and request PMEs through the HR Dashboard.
![Icon handshake](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/657ef9da8c7e52630df97951_Vector.png)
### Inclusive Dependent Policy
Our dependent policy has streamlined hierarchy requirements, no minimum participation rate, and allows for cohabiting / same-sex partners.
![Icon suitcase](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/657ef9e7728c9a6088e3a3d6_Vector-1.png)
### **MBL and ABL Plans**
Choice of Maximum Benefit Limit (MBL) and Annual Benefit Limit (ABL) coverage for your team depending on company’s budget and preference.
![Icon people](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/657ef9f1e263ba3262cfee3d_Vector-2.png)
### **Perfect for SMEs**
Our comprehensive plans are accessible even to small teams, starting with a minimum of only 3 employees.
## Experience the Hive Difference
![Icon medicine](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/6576df1246fa9d4b506ee43c_green-healthcare-icon.png)
### Comprehensive & Modern Benefits
Complete HMO coverage with unique benefits such as teleconsults, mental health, maternity, and medicine.
![Icon healing hands](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/6576e099925cfac8e447aa7f_yellow-hands-icon.png)
### **Hassle-Free Care Availment**
Responsive omni-channel customer care hotlines, members can request Letters of Authorization (LOAs), book teleconsults & APE directly from Hive portal.
![Icon medical professional](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/6576e194b1be92fb6ffbba37_red-user-icon.png)
### **Simplified and Efficient HR Processes**
Add and terminate members with 1 day SLA, see employees’ APE results, and request PMEs through the HR Dashboard.
![Icon handshake](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/657ef9da8c7e52630df97951_Vector.png)
### Inclusive Dependent Policy
Our dependent policy has minimal hierarchy requirements, no minimum participation rate, and allows for cohabiting / same-sex partners.
![Icon suitcase](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/657ef9e7728c9a6088e3a3d6_Vector-1.png)
### **MBL and ABL Plans**
Choice of Maximum Benefit Limit (MBL) and Annual Benefit Limit (ABL) coverage for your team depending on company’s budget and preference.
![Icon people](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/629f687278497eaee9317422/657ef9f1e263ba3262cfee3d_Vector-2.png)
### **Perfect for SMEs**
Our comprehensive plans are accessible even to small teams, starting with a minimum of only 3 employees.
## We make sure your employees & their loved ones get the best care possible.
We provide all-in-one HMO plans & access to the top healthcare providers. Our network, powered by our subsidiary HPPI, includes **1,700+** hospitals, clinics, & dental clinics, and **20,000+** doctors nationwide.
#### **Inpatient and Outpatient Care**
Comprehensive inpatient, outpatient and emergency coverage, including procedures for pre-existing conditions.
#### **Direct Teleconsults**
Video consults with our in-house network of primary care and specialist doctors.
#### **Mental Health Coverage**
Mental health video consults with our in-house network of mental health physicians and psychiatrists.
#### Maternity Benefits
Cash assistance for normal delivery, C-section, and miscarriage for female members.
#### **Medicine Reimbursement**
Partial reimbursement for outpatient prescription medicine, processed within 5 to 7 business days.
#### **Wellness Initiatives**
Quarterly Wellness Webinars on preventive care topics; Hive exclusive discounts at partner lifestyle, wellness, and fitness establishments.
#### **Annual Physical Exams**
Members can self-schedule APEs at partner clinics; Hive medical team to upload & summarize results on member portal.
#### Dental Coverage
Comprehensive dental benefits including oral prophylaxis, temporomandibular joint (TMJ), and orthodontic consultations, fillings, x-rays, etc.
#### COVID-19 Benefits
RT-PCR and antigen COVID-19 tests for symptomatic cases, PUIs, PUMs, and other medically necessary reasons.
[Learn More](https://www.ourhivehealth.com/</hmo-benefits>)

## The Hive Member Portal features include:
  * Easily Search for the Nearest Providers
Find the closest accredited providers with ease, ensuring prompt care is always within reach for your team.
  * Real-Time Updates on Approvals & Claims
Quickly request for Letter of Approval (or LOAs) and file reimbursement claims.
  * **Medical Records in One Place**
View your electronic medical records such as post-teleconsult doctor forms and APE results in one go.


![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628299f8aa233b83918e24fd_Pause.svg)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628298b20ae0236682d4b87f_Play-24.svg)
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628299f8aa233b83918e24fd_Pause.svg)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628298b20ae0236682d4b87f_Play-24.svg)
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
## The Hive HR Dashboard features include:
  * **Member Management**
Add and terminate members with 1 business day turnaround time, ability to also edit select member data.
  * **APE Results & PME Requests**
See statuses and results of employees’ Annual Physical Exams, and schedule applicants’ Pre-Employment Medical Exams.
  * **Invoice Overview**
View invoice breakdowns, upload proof of payment, and receive soft copies of official receipts.

## Hive Health Blog
Discover more about health, wellness, and work culture & productivity from our in-house team of professionals and medical practitioners.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bc77f8adbcf2057cf96530/67a24958e24ae910b46c3187_Blog%20Assets%20\(2\).png)
February 5, 2025
#### HMO Glossary: All the Definitions You Need to Know for HMO
Providing an HMO isn’t just a perk—it’s a commitment to employee well-being. Understanding the HMO meaning and key terms can help HR professionals and business owners navigate providers, compare plans, and make informed decisions for their team’s health and productivity.
[Read More](https://www.ourhivehealth.com/</blog/hmo-meaning-glossary>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bc77f8adbcf2057cf96530/675a7ee341dbbde71d635201_13.png)
December 10, 2024
#### What is HMO Insurance? Everything You Need to Know
When searching for health benefits, understanding the different options in the market is the first stop on your journey to finding the right plan that fits your needs — especially if it’s for your company, where the wellness of numerous people depend on the decision. We're defining what HMO insurance is to help you choose the right fit for your company.
[Read More](https://www.ourhivehealth.com/</blog/what-is-hmo-insurance-philippines>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bc77f8adbcf2057cf96530/675676524316d84a471897da_02%20Customer%20Testimonial%20Blog%20Cover%20Template%20\(1\).png)
December 9, 2024
#### Why Hive Health is the Perfect HMO for Gen Z Employees
Sam Tangco, Founder and COO of Five Story Group of Companies, sits down with us to discuss the current trend of talent acquisition where applicants look at both compensation and benefits when receiving offers, and how Hive Health's holistic benefits are just the right fit.
[Read More](https://www.ourhivehealth.com/</blog/hive-health-five-story-testimonial-interview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bc77f8adbcf2057cf96530/67122a1eadeea9a063a9dfc0_Blog%20Assets%20\(2\).png)
October 18, 2024
#### 5 Practical Tips to Manage Your Mental Health
Because mental health is just as vital as our physical health, we are raising awareness on stress, burnout, and other mental health issues and sharing practical ways to try in our daily lives.
[Read More](https://www.ourhivehealth.com/</blog/mental-health-management-tips>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bc77f8adbcf2057cf96530/66f6ce26f1b94530b8ec9944_02%20Customer%20Testimonial%20Blog%20Cover%20Template.png)
September 27, 2024
#### How Comprehensive HMO Plans Empower F&B Teams with Dot
“Healthcare should be this easy for the regular Filipino,” says Mikee Villareal, CEO and co-founder of Dot. We share our conversation with her on how Hive Health has helped her not only encourage her team to fully utilize their HMO benefits, but how it has helped her in her own journey in balancing health and building a business with impact.
[Read More](https://www.ourhivehealth.com/</blog/hive-health-dot-testimonial-interview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62bc77f8adbcf2057cf96530/66a8c0570ed6bb884f05d07e_HiveHealth-Hepa%20blog1.png)
July 30, 2024
#### World Hepatitis Day: The Key to Prevention and Treatment
Whether you're familiar with hepatitis or just learning about it, this blog will provide valuable insights into its different types, the risks associated with them, and the ways they can be diagnosed, prevented, and treated.
[Read More](https://www.ourhivehealth.com/</blog/hepatitis-all-you-need-to-know>)

Responsive omni-channel customer care hotlines, members can request Letters of Authorization (LOAs), book teleconsults & APE directly from Hive portal.
![Icon medical professional⟨12⟩]
### **Simplified and Efficient HR Processes**
Add and terminate members with 1 day SLA, see employees’ APE results, and request PMEs through the HR Dashboard.
![Icon handshake⟨13⟩]
### Inclusive Dependent Policy
Our dependent policy has minimal hierarchy requirements, no minimum participation rate, and allows for cohabiting / same-sex partners.
![Icon suitcase⟨14⟩]
### **MBL and ABL Plans**
Choice of Maximum Benefit Limit (MBL) and Annual Benefit Limit (ABL) coverage for your team depending on company’s budget and preference.
![Icon people⟨15⟩]
### **Perfect for SMEs**
Our comprehensive plans are accessible even to small teams, starting with a minimum of only 3 employees.
## We make sure your employees & their loved ones get the best care possible.
We provide all-in-one HMO plans & access to the top healthcare providers. Our network, powered by our subsidiary HPPI, includes **1,700+** hospitals, clinics, & dental clinics, and **20,000+** doctors nationwide.
#### **Inpatient and Outpatient Care**
Comprehensive inpatient, outpatient and emergency coverage, including procedures for pre-existing conditions.
#### **Direct Teleconsults**
Video consults with our in-house network of primary care and specialist doctors.
#### **Mental Health Coverage**
Mental health video consults with our in-house network of mental health physicians and psychiatrists.
#### Maternity Benefits
Cash assistance for normal delivery, C-section, and miscarriage for female members.
#### **Medicine Reimbursement**
Partial reimbursement for outpatient prescription medicine, processed within 5 to 7 business days.
#### **Wellness Initiatives**
Quarterly Wellness Webinars on preventive care topics; Hive exclusive discounts at partner lifestyle, wellness, and fitness establishments.
#### **Annual Physical Exams**
Members can self-schedule APEs at partner clinics; Hive medical team to upload & summarize results on member portal.
#### Dental Coverage
Comprehensive dental benefits including oral prophylaxis, temporomandibular joint (TMJ), and orthodontic consultations, fillings, x-rays, etc.
#### COVID-19 Benefits
RT-PCR and antigen COVID-19 tests for symptomatic cases, PUIs, PUMs, and other medically necessary reasons.
Learn More⟨2⟩
Hive Portal⟨16⟩HR Dashboard⟨17⟩
![Pause video⟨18⟩]![Play video⟨19⟩]
![Pause video⟨18⟩]![Play video⟨19⟩]
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
## The Hive Member Portal features include:
  * Easily Search for the Nearest Providers
Find the closest accredited providers with ease, ensuring prompt care is always within reach for your team.
  * Real-Time Updates on Approvals & Claims
Quickly request for Letter of Approval (or LOAs) and file reimbursement claims.
  * **Medical Records in One Place**
View your electronic medical records such as post-teleconsult doctor forms and APE results in one go.


![Pause video⟨18⟩]![Play video⟨19⟩]
![Pause video⟨18⟩]![Play video⟨19⟩]
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
## The Hive HR Dashboard features include:
  * **Member Management**
Add and terminate members with 1 business day turnaround time, ability to also edit select member data.
  * **APE Results & PME Requests**
See statuses and results of employees’ Annual Physical Exams, and schedule applicants’ Pre-Employment Medical Exams.
  * **Invoice Overview**
View invoice breakdowns, upload proof of payment, and receive soft copies of official receipts.


## What Our Members Have to Say

generated_description:
**Hive Health: Simplifying Digital Health Insurance for Filipino SMEs**

Founded in 2021 as part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, Hive Health has emerged as a key player in the Philippine health insurance landscape. Their mission is straightforward: deliver hassle-free, digital health insurance tailored specifically for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) in the Philippines.

### The Hive Platform

Hive Health distinguishes itself with a robust all-in-one digital platform that streamlines the health insurance experience for employees and HR departments alike. Their offerings are extensive, making it easy for companies to provide comprehensive coverage to their teams with minimal bureaucratic hassle. 

- **Member Benefits:** Hive Health offers complete HMO coverage that includes benefits such as teleconsultations, mental health services, maternity care, and medicine reimbursement. Coverage is designed to be comprehensive yet accessible, with plans starting for as few as three employees.

- **Hassle-Free Availment:** The platform features responsive omni-channel customer care hotlines, allowing members to quickly get Letters of Authorization (LOAs), book teleconsults, and access other services directly from the Hive portal. 

- **Efficient HR Management:** HR teams also benefit from a user-friendly dashboard that simplifies member management, including the ability to add or terminate members within a day, monitor annual physical exam results, and manage invoices.

### Inclusive Policies

Hive Health takes inclusiveness seriously. Their policies allow for cohabiting and same-sex partners, and they maintain minimal hierarchy requirements and no minimum participation rates for dependents. The company's flexibility makes it easier for SMEs to cater to their workforce's diverse needs.

### Comprehensive Provider Network

With over **1,700** accredited hospitals, clinics, dental offices, and **20,000+** doctors across the nation, Hive Health ensures its members have access to quality health care when they need it most. This extensive network is further complemented by direct teleconsultation services, mental health support, and wellness initiatives that target preventive care.

### Strong Backing and Awards

Hive Health has received support from notable investors and entrepreneurs, evidenced by its backing from funds like Amasia, BEENEXT, and GenTree. Moreover, its accolades from various notable competitions (including the HBS New Venture Competition) underline its innovative approach to health insurance in the digital age.

### Testimonials

Feedback from members indicates Hive Health’s high satisfaction levels, boasting a remarkable **4.9/5 review rating.** Users praise its intuitive portal and high-touch service, stating it allows for more focus on maintaining healthy employee teams. Testimonials convey that Hive Health's offerings align with modern employee expectations around benefits, going beyond mere salary considerations to holistic wellness packages.

### Conclusion

In a rapidly digitizing world, Hive Health stands as a promising solution for Filipino SMBs seeking streamlined and comprehensive health insurance. Their commitment to making healthcare accessible and hassle-free is evident in both their technology and customer-centric approach—making them a notable player in the health insurance narrative.

To explore more about what Hive Health offers, delve into their website [here](https://www.ourhivehealth.com).
